content.text: Match ends, Borussia Dortmund 3, Atalanta 2.
Second Half ends, Borussia Dortmund 3, Atalanta 2.
Foul by Alexander Isak (Borussia Dortmund).
Bryan Cristante (Atalanta) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Hans Hateboer (Atalanta).
Jeremy Toljan (Borussia Dortmund) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Borussia Dortmund 3, Atalanta 2. Michy Batshuayi (Borussia Dortmund) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Mario Götze.
Substitution, Atalanta. Andrea Petagna replaces Josip Ilicic.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Alexander Isak replaces Christian Pulisic.
Substitution, Atalanta. José Luis Palomino replaces Mattia Caldara because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Mario Götze (Borussia Dortmund) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left misses to the left. Assisted by Sokratis.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Michy Batshuayi (Borussia Dortmund) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
